title: How to Make Macramendog

steps.headline: Fill the 4 1/2 quart saucepan with 8 cups of water.
Place the pan of water on the stove and turn the burner on high.
Chop up the hotdogs, as the water is boiling, in approximately ⁄4 inch (1.9 cm) pieces.
Put the hotdogs in the water.
steps.description: Wait for the water to boil.

steps.headline: Open the box of mac-n-cheese and put the pasta in the water.
steps.description: Set the timer for 6 minutes and turn the burner down to medium.

steps.headline: Crush up the package of ramen so that it does not get  tangled and is easier to eat.
Put the ramen in the water after the 6 minutes are up.
steps.description: Set the timer again at 3 minutes.

steps.headline: Turn off the stove after the 3 minutes and drain the pasta.
Add the separate seasoning and cheese packets that came with the ramen and mac-n-cheese.
Add the 1/4 cup of milk and any other seasonings or spices you might want.

text: Fill the 4 1/2 quart saucepan with 8 cups of water.  Place the pan of water on the stove and turn the burner on high.  Chop up the hotdogs, as the water is boiling, in approximately ⁄4 inch (1.9 cm) pieces.  Put the hotdogs in the water. Wait for the water to boil. Open the box of mac-n-cheese and put the pasta in the water. Set the timer for 6 minutes and turn the burner down to medium. Crush up the package of ramen so that it does not get  tangled and is easier to eat.  Put the ramen in the water after the 6 minutes are up. Set the timer again at 3 minutes. Turn off the stove after the 3 minutes and drain the pasta.  Add the separate seasoning and cheese packets that came with the ramen and mac-n-cheese.  Add the 1/4 cup of milk and any other seasonings or spices you might want.  Mix and serve.
